1.title: Education, Mocap & Hospitals

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Michael Rooker begins his journey through the world of motion and performance capture specifically for video games. Sean Astin visits two premiere game design schools located at the New York Film Academy and the Los Angeles Film School. Zelda Williams ventures to Children's Hospital Los Angeles to learn how gaming is being used for pain management, rehabilitation, and therapy for child patients.

2.title: History, Esports Part 1 & Performance

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Tom Arnold takes a trip through gaming's past, present, and future. Actress and YouTube celebrity Meghan "Strawberry 17" Camarena, begins an epic journey into the exciting world of E-sports, while Michael Rooker continues his performance capture education through hands-on demos.

3.title: Game Journalism, Nintendo & Violence

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Sean Astin journeys into the world of gaming journalism and meets with industry godfather Nolan Bushnell. Alison Haislip receives unprecedented access to Nintendo's top executives, including legendary creator of Super Mario, Shigeru Miyamoto. Finally, Matt Walsh, sits down with doctors, psychologists, and industry experts to explore one of the most controversial topics in gaming.

4.title: E-Sports Part 2, Franchises & Rehabilitation

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Meghan Camarena continues her epic E-Sports journey while Tom Arnold now dives into modern game development, exploring mega franchises Call of Duty, Tomb Raider, and Angry Birds. Zelda Williams concludes her exploration of gaming in hospitals by discussing game play benefits with doctors.

5.title: Game Brain, Production & Gearbox

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Michael Rooker wraps up his exploration of the performance capture process and gets one-on-one with industry mega-publisher, Capcom. Matt Walsh delves even deeper into the effects gaming has on our brains, our behavior, and the world around us. Enter Penn Jillette, world-renowned magician, meets with the rock star developers of the games industry to get a look at contemporary game development.

6.title: Future, Innovation & Champions!

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Tom Arnold concludes his gaming journey by looking to the future of video games, from the still-developing streamer phenomenon to the preservation of games history. Penn Jillette continues his exploration of game development with three of the most influential game creators of the past decade. Meghan Camarena's epic exploration of the esports explosion comes to a close, getting the final word on the competition.

7.title: Indies, Psychology & Dev Community

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Alison Haislip wraps up her journey by exploring the independent game development scene. Matt Walsh uncovers the latest science on the addictiveness of games and gets the final word in 'game psychology'. Penn Jillette discovers new insights into the future of game development and just how tightly knit the developer community really is.

8.title: Unlocked: Behind the Scenes

episode of.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Go behind the scenes to discover how this unique documentary series was made, from preproduction to post. Hear from fans at industry mega-events like Comic Con, E3, and PlayStation Experience. Watch Unlocked director Jeremy Snead's personal interviews talking games with William Shatner, Kevin Smith and Tony Hawk.

locations: New York City, New York, USA::(on location)
imdb.plot outline: Follow 8 celebrity personalities each on their own individual "gaming journeys" to unlock various aspects of the video games industry. Sean Astin visits two of the world's leading game design schools talking with professors and students as well as diving into the world of video-game journalism and history. Tom Arnold takes a journey through the past, present and future of video game development while Michael Rooker spends some time on a motion capture stage specifically designed for gaming. Matt Walsh travels to USC where he speaks with industry professionals about the psychology of game design and game play itself. Zelda Williams goes to Children's Hospital Los Angeles where she meets patients and physicians and learns all about how gaming is being used as a tool for rehabilitation and pain management. Consumate gaming host Alison Haislip gets unprecedented access to the legendary game company Nintendo where she interviews industry icons like Shigeru Miyamoto, Reggie Fils-Aimee and even gets to meet Mario himself! Youtube sensation Meghan "Strawburry 17" Camarena is our consummate Esports hosts following Riot Games' annual "League Of Legends: Championship Series" from Los Angeles to New York and Berlin. Finally Unlocked Director Jeremy Snead gets the opportunity to talk gaming with icons William Shatner, Kevin Smith & Jason Mewes as well as skate icon Tony Hawk.
imdb.title: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed
akas: Unlocked: The World of Games, Revealed (United States)
plot: Unlocked is a groundbreaking 8 part documentary series that provides firsthand stories by industry icons, celebrities, consumers, and field experts on the culture, technology, history, and future of the video game industry.::Jeremy Snead

Follow 8 celebrity personalities each on their own individual "gaming journeys" to unlock various aspects of the video games industry. Sean Astin visits two of the world's leading game design schools talking with professors and students as well as diving into the world of video-game journalism and history. Tom Arnold takes a journey through the past, present and future of video game development while Michael Rooker spends some time on a motion capture stage specifically designed for gaming. Matt Walsh travels to USC where he speaks with industry professionals about the psychology of game design and game play itself. Zelda Williams goes to Children's Hospital Los Angeles where she meets patients and physicians and learns all about how gaming is being used as a tool for rehabilitation and pain management. Consumate gaming host Alison Haislip gets unprecedented access to the legendary game company Nintendo where she interviews industry icons like Shigeru Miyamoto, Reggie Fils-Aimee and even gets to meet Mario himself! Youtube sensation Meghan "Strawburry 17" Camarena is our consummate Esports hosts following Riot Games' annual "League Of Legends: Championship Series" from Los Angeles to New York and Berlin. Finally Unlocked Director Jeremy Snead gets the opportunity to talk gaming with icons William Shatner, Kevin Smith & Jason Mewes as well as skate icon Tony Hawk.::Jeremy Snead
